contest-event.event-date:
June 4, 1900 D Abergavenny Contest
Abergavenny Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Abergavenny Contest abergavenny-contest
Songs of the Sea
Castle Grounds, Abergavenny, Monmouthshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £11.11s., 2nd £8.8s., 32rd £6.6s. March contest - 1st Abertillery Town. Promoted by Abergavenny (London and North Western Railway Band). 3 bands competed.
June 13, 2018, 7:33 p.m. June 13, 2018, 7:41 p.m.
1 Plymouth Workmens F. Hanney
2 Abertillery Town Brian Wright
3 Blaenavon Templars John Bond
